p: Patient 2 also had a complete remission in BM with no blast cells were observed in the BM smear 10Â days after 1928zT2 T cells infusion (Fig. 4b). Six months later, restaging PET/CT revealed the absence of the abnormal intense high metabolic region, suggesting a remission in the kidney (Fig. 4c). This patient remained being in CR and received the second allo-HSCT from an unrelated donor in April 2017.
